<p style="text-align: center" align="center">
  A Figma plugin to help you generate colours and helpful code snippets for colours.
</p>

---

![](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/1856992/370504874-5f91f0e2-ba22-4a80-9783-343118de4301.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..97gH5kNCx70uxWL0tOAhQsj4HFz_vgJuiK9nLWinykU)


## Development

Install the dependencies:

    npm install

Watch for file changes:

    npm run watch

Import the project into Figma via the Plugin menu.
